entry.title: What in the World...
entry.content:
Blogging is fashionable again, so I too will add some noise to the mix.

Why blog at all?

My hope is that this platform will give me the opportunity to show off cool projects that I work on while refining my writing and communication skills. I am interested in a wide range of topics in computer science, but tend to stay in the general (and broad) areas of programming language theory and design, artificial intelligence, and security. I also plan to make casual posts from time to time to try and regain perspective and a little sanity.

:doot:
